history: It's experience was decreased from 9,000 to 7,200 on [[Updates/12.31]].
name: Black Sphinx Acolyte
bestiarytext: The Black Sphinx Acolytes are working together with [[Priestess of the Wild Sun|Priestesses Of The Wild Sun]] and [[Burning Gladiator]]s.
sounds: Darkness is the mother of all knowledge!
location: [[Issavi Sewers]], [[Kilmaresh Catacombs]] and [[Kilmaresh Mountains]] (above and under ground).
strategy: The acolyte's own damage isn't very high, but with its summon it becomes the strongest Fafnar Cultist. Try to kill it as fast as possible before it summons the Skeleton Elite Warrior which makes the battle much harder.
